desc: Here at Yooper Minky Designs we make and sell high quality minky products, including blankets, pillowcases, stuffed decor, and pillowbeds. We will also custom design and make a blanket for you. Our botique carries some apparel, gourmet treats, and many other items.

layout.text: We sell high quality apparel, Gourmet food items, a variety of accessories, and locally made Minky Blankets
